extendedInfo.description: Heads Up Charades! is the outrageously fun and exciting multi-activity game for you and your friends!With different challenges from dancing, singing, acting or sketching -- guess the word on the card thatâs on your head from your friendsâ clues before the timer runs out!Features:- Play with one friend, or one hundred at the same time.- Draw a new card by tilting your phone up or down- Wacky activities from dancing, impersonating to trivia will challenge even the most well-rounded playersWith over 25 themed decks to choose from, each packed with over 100+ exciting gameplay cards, the fun will never stop! So whether you're an artist, a singer, an actor, or a science nerd--there's something for everyone.Decks include:- TV Shows & Movies- Dance Moves- Science- I Love the 70s, 80s, & 90s- Movie Characters- Accents and Impressions- Animal Kingdom- Act it Out- Sports Legends- Fairy Tales- Famous People- State Capitals- Literature- Science- Landmarks and Destinations- Kids: Movies and TV Shows- Facial Expressions- Name Brand- Food Nation- Broadway Musicals- America's Got TalentChallenging players in trivia and creativity, your next party, reunion or family game night will never be the same. Great with groups and used as an icebreaker! Never go bored again when you are hanging out with friends. If you love games like Taboo, Guesstures, Reverse Charades, Cranium, Catch Phrase, or Scattergories then you'll love this game! Disclaimer:This is an unofficial fan-made app not affiliated with the Ellen iPhone Heads Up! app. We are in NO WAY affiliated with Ellen DeGeneres, her Heads Up app or the Ellen show. We are independent app-developers and we made the app, because we love Ellen's show and we wanted to provide the opportunity to all of Ellen's fans on Android to enjoy a similar app.

reviews.title: Highly Enjoyable
reviews.comment: Fun game. Had similar \"invisible ad\" issues as others. Overall it is a great app that we enjoy playing.

reviews.title: Thank u
reviews.comment: Love that this was made for android 2   great idea  its a great family/friends game good social game everyone of all ages can enjoy

reviews.title: Easy-to-use and Fun (:
reviews.comment: the game has a simple and colourful interface and is very fun to play with friends!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great party game
reviews.comment: Had a lot of fun with this game. Best played in a big group. It\'s bit too sensitive though, because while trying to turn it downwards my friends keep tilting it upwards first and it always registered as pass. Otherwise great app
reviews.author: Li Youhan

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Its so much fun. I wish it took video like the other app. But it was so fun to see other people try to explain the topic! Simple to use and a great ice breaker!
reviews.author: Kayla Cremers

reviews.title: Very innovative and extremely fun!
reviews.comment: It\'s a great game to play with your friends because it\'s challenging for the ones guessing as well for the ones describing. It\'s also a great drinking game. Simple and very funny!
reviews.author: Ana Petkovic

reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.comment: A well designed game converting an old concept into something fresh. The integration of technology blends well into the game play. Would give a five star rating if the ads didn\'t take up so much space
reviews.author: Rafa Abaya

reviews.title: Best Game Ever
reviews.comment: Tons of categories with LOTS of words, so repeats aren\'t common. Looking forward to either more words or the option to add your own. Totally worth the buy.
reviews.author: Half Jack

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Good old fashioned fun, addictive and very easy to play.
reviews.author: Alex Hyslop

reviews.title: Amazing family fun!!!
reviews.comment: We have spent hours playing this together and it has a category for everyone.  No bugs, a must have in my opinion.
reviews.author: Shannon Washington

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Game provides a lot of fun and laughter. It seems like this version has more cateogories compared to the iOS version which is a huge plus
reviews.author: Lance Toy

reviews.title: Emma Watson told me to download this game
reviews.comment: She tweeted that this game was a must have. So I downloaded it and  now have loads of fun with the family
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Plenty of fun to be had
reviews.comment: Fun but would be better with video record function like on iOS version
